thread.title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger reveals game-plan for Bayern Munich | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger reveals game-plan for Bayern Munich | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger reveals game-plan for Bayern Munich | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 10:32 am Arsene Wenger ready to hit Bayern on the break (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has admitted he may have to alter his side’s game-plan as he prepares for a tough Champions League clash away to Bayern Munich. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Gunners boss is known for favouring a possession-based game and an attacking approach, but concedes that his side will have to adapt as they can’t expect much of the ball at the Allianz Arena tonight. 
Arsenal lost heavily on their last trip to Munich, with the Bavarians dishing out a 5-1 thrashing when they met in the group stage last season. Wenger’s side face a tough tie in the Champions League (Picture: Getty) 
Still, Arsenal fans will be glad to hear their manager is open to some tactical versatility by showing he’s finally ready to try a more sensible approach to dealing with such strong opposition.
